Package ch.pschatzmann.edgar.reporting

Automatic generation of SQL request in order to provide the data based on the user selection. We also provide all the necessary information to build the data selection which consists of the value field, columns and rows.
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISQLModel
    Interface which allows for the implementation of different models to implement the construction of the SQL command
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractModel
    We can define the row fields, column fields and the value field.
    DateTable
    Scenario1: select only 1 quarter values Scenario2: select 1,2,3,4 Q values (max Q)
    DBField
    Represents a single Table field.
    DBMS
    Access to database.
    DBRelation
    Defines the relationship between tables.
    DBTable
    Model for a single SQL database table which contains fields and which has relationships to other tables.
    EdgarModel
    Implementation of the abstract Model for the Edgar database
    JoinCondition
    Defines the joins relationships on the field level and is used to generate the join statement.
    NavigationField
    Field information which contains enough context information so that we are able to generate the complete SQL command: The relation information is necessary so that we know on which join path the field is located.
    PostgresSQLModel
    Implementation which provides the join logic.
    PostgresSQLModelExt
    Implementation which supports the proper handling of alternative parameter names as specified by priority in the SQL mapping table
    PostgresSQLModelPriorities
    Implementation which supports the proper handling of alternative parameter names
    Table
    Table representation of data where the numerical values are split up in columns and rows.
    TableFormatterSQL
    Provides the SQL query which is used to create the table
    ValueField
    The value field which is not grouped needs to have an aggregate function defined.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DateTable.Type
